Error
Information
Image Information
Confirmation
Select Folder
Tip

[HTML]There are no pictures in the input folder.

You may need to change the input folder and restart this action.

Alternatively, you may now import photos from the gallery.
No eye photos available
There are no pictures in the input folder. You may import photos from the gallery.
Please select a name
The selected photos have been organized. There are more photos that may be organized.
Cannot create folder %1$s
Cannot write to folder %1$s. Please select a different folder in internal storage or SD card.
The date of the photos of %1$s from %2$s cannot be changed to %3$s, as there are already photos for this date
There are no organized photos available for display. Please take first a pair of eye photos and assign name and date.
File %1$s does not exist
Failed to move file %1$s to %2$s
Error while moving folder %1$s to %2$s - please check folders and move files to appropriate folder.
Failed to rename file %1$s to %2$s
Failed to delete the photo %1$s
Failed to delete all files of input folder
Failed to delete the photos of %1$s from %2$s
Failed to move the photos of %1$s from %2$s
Failed to delete the folder of %1$s
Could not change date for photos of %1$s from %2$s to %3$s
Failed to store metadata in file %1$s
Failed to store EXIF metadata in file %1$s - please contact the developer!
Failed to access the camera.\n\nError Details: %1$s
Failed to open Google Play.
In the trial version you are allowed to use only up to three names. Please purchase a premium pack to get unlimited access.
The trial version of the app can be used only for two weeks. Please purchase a premium pack to get unlimited access.
Your purchase transaction of premium pack is pending. Please ensure that the transaction will be completed.
The trial version of the app is limited to three overlays. Please purchase a premium pack to get unlimited access.
Thanks for your purchase!
Thanks for your purchase! You can now use the app without limitations.
Thanks for your purchase! Please ensure that the transaction will be completed.
In the following Android dialog, please select the external SD card (either the full card or your selected folder) and confirm at the bottom.
In the following Android dialog, please select the folder where you want to store eye photos and confirm at the bottom.
In the following Android dialog, please select the folder where you want to store eye photos and confirm at the bottom. The app will store the photos in a new subfolder “%1$s” of the selected folder.

In order to support latest Android versions, the app needs to query for folder permissions again. In the following Android dialog, please select the folder “%1$s” where you store the eye photos and confirm permission.
You selected a different folder “%2$s”. Please select the folder “%1$s” where the eye photos are currently stored.
In the following Android dialog, please select the input folder for new eye photos and confirm at the bottom.

In order to support latest Android versions, the app needs to query for folder permissions again. In the following Android dialog, please select the input folder for new eye photos “%1$s” and confirm permission.
You selected a different folder “%2$s”. Please select the current input folder “%1$s”.

With Android 11, you will need to give additional permissions to the app, so that it can still read and write the eye photos on the device. You can give the permissions already now. Do you want to do this now?
Do you want to do it on next app use, or do you want to postpone it until the device is upgraded to Android 11?
File %1$s is not formatted correctly
Do you really want to delete the photos of %1$s from %2$s?
Do you really want to delete %1$s with all photos?
Do you really want to delete the photo %1$s?
Do you really want to delete the two photos?
Do you really want to delete all photos from the input folder?
The selected photos are no JPG photos. Therefore, part of the functionality (such as storing information) will not work. Do you want to continue?
For the name “%1$s” there are already eye photos from %2$s. Do you want to overwrite these?\n\nOtherwise, please select a different name or date.
This app needs to have permission on your external storage in order to access the images. Please provide this access.
Please provide access to the camera.
The app cannot run with missing mandatory permissions. Finishing app.
If you like the app, then please recommend it.\n\nWould you like to rate it on Google Play?
Do you want to remove the rating icon from the app?
Do you want to use an external LED flash connected to the headphone jack?

The app has crashed due to lack of memory. If this happens repeatedly, then you should go to the settings, change the setting “Show image in full resolution” to the value “Load only on demand”, and reduce the value of “Max Bitmap size”.
From now on, the app will show hints in various situations (including the ones that you switched off earlier). You can switch them off individually.
From now on, the app will not show any of the currently existing hints. New hints of future versions will be shown.
Triggering purchase on Google Play…
The user key “%1$s” has been revoked due to abuse
Please resize the eye until the iris fills the circle. Then press “OK”.
Please resize the eye until the pupil fills the circle. Then press “OK”.
